bioconda.name: igdiscover
bioconda.summary: Analyze antibody repertoires and discover new V genes

biocontainers.name: igdiscover
biocontainers.summary: Analyze antibody repertoires and discover new V genes

biotools.summary: Analyzes antibody repertoires and discovers new V genes from high-throughput sequencing reads. Heavy chains, kappa and lambda light chains are supported (to discover VH, VK and VL genes).

bioschemas.name: IgDiscover
bioschemas.summary: Analyzes antibody repertoires and discovers new V genes from high-throughput sequencing reads. Heavy chains, kappa and lambda light chains are supported (to discover VH, VK and VL genes).
